statements: DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM incident_response WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM incident_response WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM Incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5 and incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND incident_severity > 5;
